{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.05025v1", "title": "Neumann Problems for Elliptic and Parabolic Sum Hessian Equations", "summary": "This paper studies the Neumann boundary value problem for sum Hessian
equations. We first derive a priori $C^2$ estimates for $(k-1)$-admissible
solutions in almost convex and uniformly $(k-1)$-convex domains, and prove the
existence of admissible solutions via the method of continuity. Furthermore, we
obtain existence results for the classical Neumann problem in uniformly convex
domains. Finally, we extend these results to the corresponding parabolic
problems.", "main_category": "math.AP", "categories": "math.AP", "published": "2025-04-07T12:50:00Z"}
